title: Lisa Scottoline - Rosato & Associates series(Legal Thrillers
description:
Lisa Scottoline graduated cum laude from the University of Pennsylvania Law School in 1981. All of Lisa's books draw on her experience as a trial lawyer, and her first novel -Everywhere That Mary Went- became a bestseller and was nominated for the Edgar Award, the most prestigious award given in crime fiction, awarded by the Mystery Writers of America. 
Lisa's second novel, Final Appeal, was also nominated for and received an Edgar Award. Since then she has written eleven more legal suspense novels, all of which have appeared on bestseller lists.
A native Philadelphian, she lives with her family in the Philadelphia area.

1 Everywhere That Mary Went		
2 Final Appeal			
3 Running from the Law		
4 Legal Tender				
5 Rough Justice			
6 Mistaken Identity				
7 Moment of Truth			
8 The Vendetta Defense		
9 Courting Trouble		
10 Dead Ringer			
11 Killer Smile			
12 Lady Killer			
13 Think Twice			
14 Accused
